text:
Sharan Adla
- Email me on Indeed: indeed.com/r/Sharan-Adla/3a382a7b7296a764

• Having 4yrs. of solid work experience in designing experiences for Digital (Web, Mobile) and
Print media

Dreamweaver
• Experience in creating low/high-detailed annotated wireframes, and user flows for applications
using prototyping tools
• Having good knowledge on developing use cases, user stories, & personas
• Hands-on experience with HTML5 & CSS3, including cross-browser compatibility
• Hands-on experience in creating RWD (Responsive Web-Design) layouts
• Having good exposure on Marketing and Health Care domains
• Good knowledge on marketing automation tool Eloqua
• Hands-on experience on version control tool SVN
• Quick learner, self-driven, problem-solver, highly motivated team player and ability to quickly
adapt to new trends and technologies
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills to engage clients and the team
collaboratively
• Having good leadership and team management skills
